Html:
I've just finished the first version of a Visual Studio Debugger Visualizer for the Html Agility Pack. It allows to browse the DOM / Nodes while debugging. XPath expressions can be evaluated during the debug session.

Here is the project:
http://www.crawler-lib.net/visual-studio-debugger-visualizers

Hello,

I've just been using this and found it very helpful for resolving an issue I was having where the HAP tree didn't mirror what I was expecting... many thanks for posting this visualizer!

(And a thousand curses upon whichever designer of HTML thought overlapping FORM elements was a good idea)

Regards;
Richard Moss
